    Victor Martins Gomes

    “In research, the horizon recedes as we advance, and is no nearer at 60 than it was at 20. As the power of endurance weakens with age, the urgency of pursuit grows more intense... and research is always incomplete.” (Mark Pattison, 1875).

    This website intends to promote my professional life and ongoing research activities. Moreover it aims at disclosing my work-related material, including my codes, following the open-source initiative and the ideas of reproducible research. Likewise, trying to be as optimistic as Nick Barnes, I hope that what I share can help someone.
